name: 布兰登·阿罗约
name_full: 布兰登·阿罗约 Brandon Arroyo
introduction: Brandon Arroyo is a professional actor and active member of the Screen Actors Guild.His first experiences in acting came at the Brookside High School Drama Club in Sheffield, OH. During his first performance of the musical "Li'l Abner", Brandon missed the opening number due to competing in the Ohio High School basketball playoffs the same night. He then joined the cast mid performance in the second scene. Brandon finished high school performing in the play "Pride and Prejudice" as well as taking part in an acting seminar at the New York University.Brandon's first professional experience on screen came as a journalist, covering news, sports and entertainment at several TV stations in the mid-west, including: WOIO (CBS Cleveland), WSAZ (NBC Charleston), WICU (NBC Erie), and BCSN (Toledo).Brandon also hosts a long running interview show called "The Arroyo Show". Guests of the show have included Laura Marano, Drake Bell, and the late Mac Miller.Brandon is a graduate of Kent State University in Kent, Ohio.
